nodes.text: The Crash Survival Kit was a popular model of survival kit manufactured by Pretormin Environmental. It included a thermal cloak, multipurpose knife, distress beacon, two emergency comlinks, wire spool, ration bars, a basic medpac, two respirators, water filter and jug, a glow rod, 50 meters of high strength microfiber, ten ration packs, and a flare gun. Some pirates augmented their kits with compact blasters or other weapons, though this was not standard. The kit cost 300 credits.
